record.source: Journal of gastrointestinal and liver diseases : JGLD
record.title: Machine Learning Models predicting Decompensation in Cirrhosis.
record.subjects: Liver Cirrhosis diagnosis ; Machine Learning ; Predictive Value of Tests ; Humans ; Retrospective Studies ; Female ; Male ; Prospective Studies ; Middle Aged ; Biomarkers blood ; Bilirubin blood ; Proof of Concept Study ; Risk Factors ; Risk Assessment ; Support Vector Machine ; Databases, Factual ; Prognosis ; Aged ; Decision Support Techniques
record.abstract: Decompensation of cirrhosis significantly decreases survival, thus, prevention of complications is paramount. We used machine learning techniques to identify parameters predicting decompensation.
record.contributors: Müller, Sophie Elisabeth ; Casper, Markus ; Ripoll, Cristina ; Zipprich, Alexander ; Horn, Paul ; Krawczyk, Marcin ; Lammert, Frank ; Reichert, Matthias Christian
